name: The Luxurious Provencal Ranch
description:
DESCRIPTION
A five-star luxury hotel, we invite you to discover the secret and wild wilderness, a land of passion and traditions in the south of Provence. It is the fusion of a farmhouse and a manade that makes the 5-star hotel so special.
Building of character by its old stones, at the same time modern by the way in which it was fitted out, the Ranch will make you benefit from all its comfort services and its contemporary equipment.
Have the curiosity to discover a place of unpretentious luxury. Discover the wilderness that characterizes the area. Savor local cuisine in a restaurant that carefully works regional dishes. The 5-star hotel also has a relaxation area for an hour or two of well-being, massage, nothing like a break from your daily life and all the stress of your big day!
A FAMILY STORY ...
This house has been inhabited for several generations by the same family who restored this farmhouse to make it a charming, chic, simple and warm hotel. The 8 rooms and the 7 junior suites combining great comfort and character are both modern and refined and can cater for 30 of your guests on site. If you have more guests that you would like to host on site then we are set up for glamping, just ask for more details!!
THE SITES
The sheep fold: Time will stop … an instant of magic …. Have the property all to yourselves… and your wedding will become a truly exceptional moment…
Drinks in the gardens, dining and dancing at the sheep fold and will permit you to carry the festive moment over into the wee hours, brunch at the pool to prolong the moment… You will feel completely at home…This modular room of 750m² will receive all your guests who will have the necessary space to celebrate your union with dignity.
The Cabin: At the heart of the wild wilderness, plan your event and bring your guests into an unusual universe, rich in traditions.
Local cuisine, wide preserved spaces, total immersion in the realm of black bulls and white horses for an infinite feeling of liberty…
The Terrace: Organise a completely intimite get-together in an exceptional setting… Drinks on the terrace in the shade of a wisteria, with its intoxicating smells in the springtime, a savory local lunch or dinner, a cozy warm atmosphere for a moment when time stops…
TRADITIONAL LOCAL ACTIVITIES
The Ranch is all yours! Take advantage of your reception to invite your guests to discover local culture and traditions. The owner will be delighted to share his passion with you and tell you the history of the farm : take the “Pelot’s” (farmer’s) tour, visit the bull and The Ranches horse pastures, discover rice-growing… A private unique experience which all your guests will remember! Totally unique to this wedding venue.
FACILITIES
• 5-star hotel, 8 rooms, 6 junior suites and 1 suite
• Locavore restaurant
• Outdoor swimming pool
• Reception venues for professional and private events
• Park and gardens
• Relaxation lounge
• Private covered and secure parking
• Heli-pad
• Room service
• Free WIFI
• Horseback riding on the estate
• Discovery of the property by 4x4
• Mountain bike available
For more information on this venue then please do get in touch and we would be more than happy to send through some more information.
